option.od: print the help message and exit.
print the RST version number and exit.
verbose. Log information to the console.
filename of the fit format file to convert.

synopsis.p: Converts a fit format file to fitacf format.

description.p: Converts a fit format file to fitacf format.
The fitacf format data is written to standard output.

example.description: Convert the file "test.fit" to the fitacf format file "test.fitacf".
